A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a shit show. Man this was just epic bad writing. The story makes no sense. The entire middle of the movie\, during the slowest chase scene ever\, could have been just cut out. Rose Tico's character has to be the worst written in Star Wars history\, and Jar Jar set the bar pretty low. The humor was WAY off. There were literally "your mama' jokes.


What the hell were they smoking when they made this dumpster fire.
